title: Video: India bets on solar power for bright future
text: India bets on solar power for bright future Agence France-PresseSep. 29, 2015. 01:31 AM EST India is giving its solar energy sector a major boost to try to satisfy growing electricity deman... More » India is giving its solar energy sector a major boost to try to satisfy growing electricity demands from its 1.2 billion strong population and tackle climate change.
